title: 2016 Dhivehi Premier League
text:
The 2016 Dhivehi Premier League was the second season of the <a href="Dhivehi%20Premier%20League">Dhivehi Premier League</a>, the top division of <a href="Football%20in%20the%20Maldives">Maldivian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a>. The season began on 19 April 2015. The league was made up of the 8 clubs.
Format.
All eight teams play against each other in Three Round Format. Team with most total points at the end of the season will be crowned as Dhivehi Premier League champion and qualified to the <a href="AFC%20Cup">AFC Cup</a>. Top four teams qualify for the President's Cup.
Teams.
A total of 8 teams will be contesting in the league, including 7 sides from the <a href="2015%20Dhivehi%20Premier%20League">2015 Dhivehi Premier League</a> season and one promoted from the <a href="2015%20Second%20Division%20Football%20Tournament">2015 Second Division Football Tournament</a>.
